column2: "Everything is a mess with so many hostiles appearing, but it's got to be the Darkers' fault!"
"So more than anything, it's essential that we take care of those Darkers right away!"
"...I say \"we\", but there's nothing I can do. Still, the principle is what counts!"
"I can't take part in the fighting, so I can only ask others. From the bottom of my heart, I want peace right away!"
